name: Innovation List Shortcode
author: Bhupesh Kushwaha

sections.description:
This plugin provides add Innovations and shortcode to get list Innovation posts with slider.

Here You can get code with using [list-posts-innovation].
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Upload the whole plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Now, go to the page/post menu add Shortcode [list-posts-innovation]
  5. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download the plugin.
  2. Upload the whole plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Now, go to the page/post menu add Shortcode [list-posts-innovation]
  5. Enjoy!

short_description: Add [list-posts-innovation] shortcode which enables you to output anywhere in your page or post.
